title: Automated Rigger
text:
Summary: Python based rigging tools scripted in Python for Maya.

Description: Python based tools that provide a UI to automated rigging in Maya VFX software by providing tools for an artist to quickly build a skeleton to bind to a model.

Technology: Python2, Maya

title: Python / Maya Show reel
text:
Summary: Various python tools

Description:

- My automated rigging tools used in advertising to speed up binding controlls to models.

- The custom muscle simulation system written from scratch in python implementing volume perserving algorithms, with added UI and options to mirror bind them to a skeleton.

- The flocking algorithm was written in python and takes various attributes to allow a user to alter the flocks behaviour.

title: Digital Workshop
text:
Summary: Learning platform funded by google to provide online tuition for various online subjects.

My Role: Leading team to add new and improve existing functionality of site.

Technology: AngularJs, Python2, Webapp2, Google Appengine

title: Olympic Channel
text:
Summary: Olympic channel is an on demand streaming service for olympic content.

My Role: Leading a BE team to build the project and integrate with core API.

Technology: Python2 / Python3, Django, AWS, NGINX
